name: MAGIC ITEM (7): DREAM KEEPER
description:
Inspired researchers in LINCOLN Massachusetts developed this portable beacon using the top-secret 'spectral valence' technology developed by Doctors Bharata Montez and Roger Ortiz during the controversial "White Feather" experiments of 1973. 


This object allows the bearer, when in a deep-REM state to shift materially to adjacent super-luminal realities adjacent to and entangled with our own -- and return safely back.

When Dr Montez became lost in one such dimension, the XARLSWYN star cluster, ORTIZ used this or a similar advice to retrieve her at least temporarily, before they both vanished permanently and the experiments were shut down. Soon after, all records and equipment, save for this item, were placed entirely out of public view.

This digital "token" confers upon you
a portion of the aesthetic and para-natural
power of this radiant meta-object.

Think on the maker of this physical item
and send them your gratitude
through the centuries - for the
privilege of holding it's
meta-verse avatar.

I took this photo and 
was blessed by this object and 
the sincere expression of it's maker.

I truly hope my photo gives a portion
of that sense of inter-dimensional possibilty to you.
